comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Race condition in ConnectionWindow disposal — ClosePanelIfEmpty() queues Close via BeginInvoke but concurrent panel/tab operations access the already-disposed window
Approach: Add IsDisposed guards before accessing ConnectionWindow in ClosePanelIfEmptyOnUiTick(), MoveConnectionTabToPanel(), and MoveToPanelMenu_DropDownOpening(); re-validate panel state after BeginInvoke dequeue before calling Close(); add try-catch for ObjectDisposedException in QueueCloseTab()
